item.title: Elcin add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Elcin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Elcin add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Elcin add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "Advice is what we ask for when we already know the answer but wish we didn’t." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Elcin add a quote by Michel Legrand
item.description: "The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know." -- Michel Legrand

item.title: Elcin add a quote by Ece Temelkuran
item.description: "bir insan bir insanda başka bir hayatın kapısını görünce aşık olur. ne mutluluktur öte yandaki, ne de tadıyla meraklandıran bir acı. aşk diye buna denir: bir insan bir insanda tekinsiz bir ev görür. insan yarası yarasına denk geleni seviyor demek ki." -- Ece Temelkuran

item.title: Elcin add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Elcin add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "If I know what love is, it is because of you." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Elcin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein
